message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.GT 

The paper presents a novel extension of Thompson Sampling for stochastic sequential decision problems with graph feedback, which is a problem commonly studied in the machine learning and artificial intelligence communities. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The paper also provides theoretical guarantees on the Bayesian regret of the algorithm, which suggests that it may also be relevant to the sub-categories of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
